name: Feed Me, Quack!
description:
You are a duck, and you are hungry. Fortunately, some silly humans around you are willing to throw some bread to see you eat it. The only problem is that you are not alone: there are other ducks ready to get that food and eat what's yours.

Swim through different lakes in this non-violent roguelite, where your objective is to eat enough bread at each stage, using the leftover bread to buy upgrades (not yet implemented, but stay tuned!) to be more effective.

Controls: Keyboard:
  • WASD or Arrow Keys: move
  • E: eat a nearby piece of bread
  • Q: dash in the direction you are facing
  • Shift: steal bread from another duck when you are close enough
  • Space: hold then release to spit away your bread, so that you can run towards a more appetizing bread
  • R: return to the game
  • ESC: quit the game
Xbox Controller:
  • Stick or DPAD: move 
  • A: eat a nearby piece of bread 
  • B: dash in the direction you are facing 
  • Y: steal bread from another duck when you are close enough 
  • X: hold then release to spit away your bread, so that you can run towards a more appetizing bread
